top_comments.comment: Lucario: "Not yet, Ash! I can do this!"

I feel like the reason why Ash lost to Alain in the Kalos League, its because Alain is in the Master 8 and Ash will bring back "SATOSHI GEKKOUGA", to battle and beat him, that will be insane!

comments_since_last_sample.body: Where did you find the episodes?
where to watch pokemon journeys dub for FREE?!

I thought it was great to set up for the main event. The little party at the start was desperately needed for Ash's Pokemon and I loved the Bea and Korrina interactions. Seriously though, can we get one battle where Lucario isn't getting brutalized to a ridiculous amount before landing one lucky critical hit? The amount of damage he's taken in this episode alone should have KO'd him. Show him dodging attacks and countering more...And landing a few hits of his own.

i read a video title somewhere saying that lucario refused mega evolution so when i was watching the episode i was half expecting ash to just be like be right back, run over to his bag and hope that he put his z ring in there and come back with it and put the key stone glove in the bag but then i remembered this isn't unova
people not notcing hau in ep
next ep is gona be cool g max vs mega
